citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on
22-APR-19.
According to an individual at the facility no one would be available to walk the inspector through the inspection
process for the day.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:30pm on
22-APR-19.
According to an individual at the facility no one would be available to walk the inspector through the inspection
process for the day.
